select
distinct
from project
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into project (pid, pname, pintro, ptypes, pamount, pstart, pend, pimg, pdetail, pcomname, pcomphon, pbank, pbanknumber, phtypes, phamount, phcontent, phnumberpeople, phday ) values (#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pstart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcomname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcomphon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pbanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phtypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phnumberpeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phday,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
